title: Amélie Poulaint
synopsis: Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and, along the way, discovers love.

title: Sin City
synopsis: An exploration of the dark and miserable Basin City and three of its residents, all of whom are caught up in violent corruption.

title: Valerie and Her Week of Wonders
synopsis: Surreal tale in which love, fear, sex and religion merge into one fantastic world, based on a classical Czech novel of the same title.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
synopsis: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Love Exposure
synopsis: A bizarre love triangle forms between a young Catholic upskirt photographer, a misandric girl and a manipulative cultist.

title: Fight Club
synopsis: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

title: Thank You For Smoking
synopsis: Satirical comedy follows the machinations of Big Tobacco's chief spokesman, Nick Naylor, who spins on behalf of cigarettes while trying to remain a role model for his 12-year old son.

title: Blade Runner 2049
synopsis: Young Blade Runner K's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

title: Drive
synopsis: A mysterious Hollywood action film stuntman gets in trouble with gangsters when he tries to help his neighbor's husband rob a pawn shop while serving as his getaway driver,
